title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, pull and delete models via Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use any local model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, model management, multi-user, Docker-ready.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming chat, embeddings, model operations, Android-compatible.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed async client covering chat, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama instance; great starter template.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement; inline completions and chat.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight PyQt5 desktop GUI for Ollama; browse, chat and manage models without leaving the app.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma; ingest PDFs and chat with your documents locally.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community Node.js wrapper around Ollama’s REST API; zero native deps, TypeScript included.

title: ollama-py
summary: Unofficial but popular Python client on PyPI; mirrors official API with extras like retry and batching.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama; plug local models into production-grade Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats via Ollama; slash commands, thread support, model switching on the fly.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; mention the bot or DM it to chat with any local model.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that streams Ollama responses; supports groups, private chats and inline queries.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, Open-WebUI, GPU support and automatic model download.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile collection for Llama-3, Phi-3, StarCoder, etc.; one-click imports.
